scenario_text.value:
All right, everybody, chatting’s nice and
all, but how much time have you got to spare?

Yeah, we really should be getting to the
tower. But what about you, Kaito?

I’ve gotta find Miu, so come on, let’s get
this over with!
Aaah!

Hey, relax! You don’t have to get so worked
up over every little thing!
What an incorrigible brute.
You said it.
So, what do we do?

I mean, it’s either we believe Kaito or this
woman, right?
She’s right... Mommy’s right...
Kewkew...

To be honest, I’m not sure how much I trust
her...

But if she knows the way to the tower, it’d
be great if she could show us.

That’s a good point. Regardless of who we
believe, we have to keep our goal in mind.

Yeah, it’d be great to have a guide! After
all, I’d hate to get lost out here.

B-but didn’t Agumon and the others already
make it up there?
What? Oh, I don’t know the way.
What?! You don’t?

I apologize if we misled you, but we only saw
the tower from afar.
You mean we could’ve gotten lost at any time?

That just makes this even better! Now we can
have her show us the way!

Yes, let’s do that. We sure don’t want to get
lost.

Wait, you actually want to trust this liar?!
That’s the monster that kidnapped Miu!
I’m telling you, you’ve got it all wrong!
Oh, great. Here we go again.
Takuma, I think it’s time we made a decision.
Right...

(This woman knows the way to the tower, but
she does seem kind of suspicious.)

(Kaito’s a friend, but he’s not making much
sense, and seems pretty hung up about Miu.)
(Who should I believe?)
Kaito.
The woman.
Kaito.
The woman.
